title: The Hovering Hummingbird
description: Hummingbirds are small, colorful birds known for their ability to hover in mid-air and fly backward. Their unique wing structure allows for incredible agility.

questions.question: Which hummingbird species is known for its ability to fly in a way that resembles a figure eight?
What is the primary food source for hummingbirds?
Hummingbirds beat their wings incredibly fast. Approximately how many times per second can some species beat their wings?
What is the collective noun for a group of hummingbirds?
Which of these is a unique feature of a hummingbird's beak?
options: It can extend to twice its length
It is flexible and can open wide like a mouth
The top and bottom halves can move independently
It is filled with tiny teeth
questions.correct_answer: The top and bottom halves can move independently
